course_title: Emergency Nursing: Jack of All Trades
course_description: This course provides an overview of emergency nursing.  Emphasis will be placed on nurse roles and responsibilities, patient- and family centered care biopsychosocial needs, triage, focused assessments and evaluation of care interventions, and legal/ethical factors influencing care.
prerequisites: NRSG 326 or equivalent transfer credit as corequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3301, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-2:50p, Instructor: A. Horigan, Status: Closed
